DarkMouse::

She was just about to awaken her leader, when the screen on the console 
showed something happening.  She checked and noticed it was a pod that had 
landed.  She opened her link,"Commander, a pod has landed. Sending you the 
co-ordinants now."  she pressed the console controls and sent the exact 
directions of the newly landed pod to her commander. "Go get them. And if 
you want, I'll program them for you. After all, I am the best computer 
rodent around." she said with an air of arrogence.


----Original message------
>New Bot

>(A stasis pod plummits from the sky. It picks up speed as it goes. Till it
